title: Foundational Education in AI-Integrated Medical Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Terminology and Digital Device Usage Skills
context.additional_context: A program for corporate managers/leaders aged 40+, combining medical simulation and AI fundamentals to deliver practical educational experiences. Conducted in small-group offline settings with digital device support to maximize learning outcomes.

learning_goals: Learners can explain fundamental principles of medical simulations and AI technology application cases.
Accurately perform emergency response scenarios with over 80% accuracy using AI-based simulation tools
Collaborate with team members to analyze simulation results and propose improvement strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
